task: Add an animation effect to a slide
steps: 4. Select the object on the slide that you want to animate.
5. Click on 'Add Animation' in the 'Animation' group.
6. Choose an animation effect from the gallery.
7. Adjust the animation options as needed.
8. Click 'Preview' to see the animation effect.
9. Click 'OK' to apply the animation effect to the object.
